Programming is how we give instructions to a computer to perform tasks.
Coding refers to writing in programming languages to create software or applications.

patterns: Can you tell me something funny?
responses: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired!

patterns: Tell me about the latest technology
What are some new tech trends?
responses: Technology is always advancing. Check out the latest tech blogs for updates.
Keep up with tech news to learn about new innovations and trends.
New technology trends include AI, IoT, and quantum computing.
Stay tuned to tech news sites for the latest developments in technology.

patterns: What are some uses of AI?
responses: Artificial Intelligence (AI) involves creating computer systems that can perform tasks typically requiring human intelligence.
AI can be used for various applications, such as natural language processing, image recognition, and decision-making.
AI systems learn from data and improve their performance over time.
Common uses of AI include virtual assistants, recommendation systems, and autonomous vehicles.

patterns: What are some applications of machine learning?
responses: Machine Learning is a subset of AI that involves training algorithms to learn from and make predictions or decisions based on data.
In machine learning, models are trained on data to identify patterns and make predictions without explicit programming.
Applications of machine learning include spam detection, image recognition, and predictive analytics.
Machine learning algorithms improve their accuracy as they are exposed to more data.
